title: League of legends won't open
body:
Hello

I have read several threads about client not wanting to open. It still hasn't solved my problem. 

Here's my case:

When I download and install LOL on my macbook, it opens once, while installing the game. whenever I shut the client down, it will not open again. I have read about deleting lock file, I have had this problem before and it worked but now I have no lock file so not working. 

Then I read about user kernel in RADS folder. I have checked everywhere but I can't find a rads folder or a user kernel file. maybe this is out dated and there is no such file anymore in the new patch idk? 

I tried installing the game and duplicating the files straight away after installing, then tried swapping them.. still not working. 

I need to reinstall the game every time I want to play.. very annoying


Can anyone help me please? 

thanks

replies.body:
Can you reach out to player support? They will ask you for your logs. Can you ask them to forward your logs to Riot BlueMonday. I can look into it for you! No promises though. macOS is rough D:

Also out of curiosity what version of macOS are you using? Catalina? Mojave? Even older? I haven't been following the discussions very closely but I think there may be some issues with Catalina?

> Then I read about user kernel in RADS folder. I have checked everywhere but I can't find a rads folder or a user kernel file. maybe this is out dated and there is no such file anymore in the new patch idk?

I believe we stopped using RADS A while ago. RADS is the old Riot patcher. Riot switched to a new much much much faster patcher.
Update: I am doing a software update on my Mac, maybe this might help ? or make it worse.. idk

Hello

I just made a ticket and asked them to forward it to you. 
Thanks for the reply. 

I am using Mojave version 10.14.6

> [{quoted}](name=Riot BlueMonday,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Vak5fL7A,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2020-02-25T23:32:56.342+0000)
>
> Can you reach out to player support? They will ask you for your logs. Can you ask them to forward your logs to Riot BlueMonday. I can look into it for you! No promises though. macOS is rough D:
> 
> Also out of curiosity what version of macOS are you using? Catalina? Mojave? Even older? I haven't been following the discussions very closely but I think there may be some issues in Catalina?
> 
> I believe we stopped using RADS A while ago. RADS is the old Riot patcher. Riot switched to a new much much much faster patcher.

Wow. It's so rare to see red comment in here.

Thanks for being here though.
